info.name: Mad Voter Diary (wordpress) Dark Text
info.description:
I like the INove theme, but I still do not like gray text. This lets me correct what I consider a flaw in what is otherwise a fine theme.

It can, of course, be used for other blogs using the same theme.
info.additionalInfo: 4/11/11 - Added dark text for list items, colorized the post timestamp.
